Content.Name: siteapplication
Content.Title: Pathway Site Application
Content.Abstract: Instructions about how to fill out the application to start a new BYU-Idaho Pathway site
Content.BodyCopy:
All Pathway sites must apply for approval from CES. The application process begins by requesting access to the application using the form below. After you submit a request, you will be emailed a username and password and instructions to begin the application. To help you prepare, some of the questions on the application have been provided below.

  • Please describe your overall strategy for informing local leaders of the Pathway Program.
  • What stakes will be involved?
  • What leaders will be instrumental in the Pathway implementation?
  • Please indicate the meetings in which the Pathway Program will be discussed.
  • What is your goal for the number of students in the first cohort?
  • How often can a group of this size begin?
  • Who will lead the recruiting effort?
  • Who will support the recruiting effort?
  • Please describe your overall strategy for recruiting students.
  • Who is the director of the designated Institute?
  • What existing communication channels/resources can be leveraged to spread the word?
  • How will you distribute BYU-Idaho Pathway Program marketing materials?
  • Please list any additional ward/stake assignments that will be made to support.
  • In current mission couples, or in considering potential mission couples, what qualities do you consider critical to their success as Pathway missionaries?
  • What resources are in place for Young Single Adults?
  • Please list any noteworthy YSA efforts within your stake or region.
  • Please list the address of the proposed Pathway site location and indicate whether the proposed site is an institute building, Stake Center, or other. Include Institute for young adults and Stake Center for adults.
  • Is there wireless Internet access at the proposed building listed above?
  • How many stakes are located within a 1 hour commute of the proposed site above?
  • What else should we consider in evaluating this request for a Pathway implementation (please explain in detail)?

Complete the following form to request access to the Pathway site application.
